title: Implement Behavior-Driven Development in Android With Cucumber
author: Stephen Henry
description: By using human language, behavior-driven development (BDD) bridges the gaps between technical and nontechnical people in software development.
cntitle: 使用 Cucumber 在 Android 中实现行为驱动开发
cndescription: 通过使用人类语言，行为驱动开发（BDD）弥合了软件开发中技术人员和非技术人员之间的差距。
